title: Rathathin Rathame Full Lyrics Velayutham Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Movie Name : Velayudham
Cast : Vijay, Genelia, Hansika Motwani,
Saranya Mohan, Santhanam
Music Director : Vijay Antony
Director : Jayam Raja
Lyrics: Kabilan, Annamalai

Rathathin rathame, en iniya udan pirappey
Sondhathin sondhame, naan eyangum uyir thudippey
Ammavum appaavum ellamey neethaaney
en vaazhkai unakallavaa....
Sethaalum pudhaithaalum chediyaaga mullaithaalum
en vaasam unakallavaa.

Rathathin rathame, en iniya udan pirappey
Sondhathin sondhame, naan eyangum uyir thudippey

Anbenra ottrai sollai pol-onru veru illai
Nee kaattum paasathuku deivangal eedu illai
En nenjam unnai mattum kedikaara mullaai suttrum
Nodineram nee pirinthaal ammaadi uyire pogum

Nee sonnal yethaiyum seiven, thalai aatum bommai aaven
Sethaalum pudhaithaalum chediyaaga mullaithaalum
en vaasam unakallavaa....ho..ho..

Rathathin rathame, en iniya udan pirappe
Sondhathin sondhame, naan eyangum uyir thudippe

Neenga romba naalu nalla irukanum, Ithemaathiri
Romba naalu nalla irukanum ....
Nooru pulla pethu, Kodi anbu serthu..
Neenga vaazhanum sandhosama,
Intha jodi pola, jodi illai-innu
vaazhndhu kaatanum sandhosama...

Tajmahal unaku, thangathil kattaporen
Megathil nooleduthu, sela naan nenju thaarren
Ennodu nee irunthaal, veraedhum eedaguma
Kandaangi sela podhum, veredhum naan ketpena

Vaanathil neelam pole, boomikkul eeram pole
Erindhaalum piriyathu, mudindhaalum mudiyaathu
naam konda uravallava ...
